product_name: Eagle Creek Sandman Travel Pillow - Small - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Arrive at your destination rested and ready to explore. The inflatable small Eagle Creek Sandman Travel Pillow is great for flights and car trips and easily adjusts to your ideal softness. Takes only 2 breaths to inflate. Sized to fit smaller necks. Easy Adjust(TM) valve lets you customize the support. Folds into its own pocket for easy storage. Soft fleece cover is removable and washable. Closeout.
short_description: Arrive at your destination rested and ready to explore. The inflatable small Eagle Creek Sandman Travel Pillow is great for flights and car trips and easily adjusts to your ideal softness.
